nodes.text: Gladiopod was a non-sentient species native to the shadow world of Umbara. The species had long spiked legs and multi-tentacled faces with four glowing red eyes on each side. Gladiopods lived in groups, fulfilling roles of either soldiers or workers.
Gladiopods were added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne with patch 5.4 that introduced Umbara to the game. They appear as enemies during the "Crisis on Umbara" flashpoint.
